name: Forget Me Not (supahsaiyan)
description:
Luca is an unfortunate man who was left in a coma after being involved in a car crash. He is visited by Emma, a doctor that specialises in restoring the mind. Emma believes that the only way to bring Luca back from his coma is to enter his mind and trigger his memories in order to evoke a feeling in his consciousness that wakes him up.

In the mind of luca, Emma comes into contact with both the Id (Lucas) and superego (Luke). The Id and superego are psychological terms used to describe the mental parts of ones personality. Luke will help Emma find the memories by giving her clues whereas Lucas will do everything in his power to make her suffer.
